lead_paragraph: Ben Curtis shot a nine-under-par 62, a career best, in the first round of the Booz Allen Classic yesterday in Potomac, Md. He was one shot off the course record at T.P.C. at Avenel, which looked especially inviting after last week's brutal challenge in the United States Open at Winged Foot.
